overview: Mr. Ira Levy was the former VP of Finance and Treasurer at Pre-Paid leader MetroPCS, where he raised $2 billion for the company through a successful IPO. Mr. Levy has over 20 years of executive experience in the wireless telecommunications industry with specific startup and development expertise from roles with a variety of high-growth companies including Verizon Wireless. Via his leadership roles, Mr. Levy is well-versed in all financial and operational functions including capital structuring, business and strategic planning, external and managerial financial reporting, internal control structure and revenue assurance.
